<section id="about" class="section">

::::::: about-container
::: about-text
I am a researcher in environmental and health economics and lab leader of the <span style="color: #2576c6;"><a href="https://www.pik-potsdam.de/en/institute/labs/policy-evaluation/governance" target="_blank" >Policy Evaluation Lab</a></span> at <span style="color: #2576c6;"><a href="https://www.pik-potsdam.de/en" target="_blank">Potsdam Institute for Climate Impact Research (PIK)</a></span>.

My research seeks to evaluate the real-word impacts of public policies and inform their design and implementation, with a focus on environmental sustainability, public health, and human well-being.

Grounded in econometrics, my work draws on quasi-experimental methods, machine learning algorithms, and micro-level data.
:::
